name: Flushed (Quinesee)
description:
Theme: Death is only the beginning.

You play as Roland, the beloved family goldfish, who has met an untimely death. As the family mourns the loss of their loyal friend and sends Roland on his way via the honorable two-flush salute , he must battle his way into the afterlife. Through pipes, sludge,  and fowl beasts, will he make it out of this hell?

Controls:
WASD - Move
Arrow Key - Shoot

Assets:

  • Dungeon Tileset V4
  • Brackey Health Bar
  • Floating Island Tileset
  • BG Music
  • Tiny Rooms Tilemap
  • Kenney Sounds
  • A* Pathfinding Free

Note:

I wasn't able to build out what I had pictured for this, so instead of a sprawling sewer complex complete with multiple enemies and bosses, we have a survival shoot-em up.
